And go for a 42" to replace a 3:4 27."  For the same viewing distance this should keep image size about the same for broadcasts in the newer format, without the need to zoom.  Things broadcast in the old 3:4 format will be very much larger with only some wasted space on the sides, but the entire signal will appear on your screen.

Reviews.Title: The TV is a masterful piece
Reviews.Author: greeneink
Reviews.Content: As a Prime member, I got $10 off, but it is well worth the price and works well with a wifi hub. I have six items connected to my hub and two of these TVs are part of it and outside of the fact that it hangs up from time to time and I have to tell it I'm still watching a show when it wants to shut itself down, it's a helluva buy. I love the fact that they work so well with Hulu, Youtube, Netflix, et al and the remotes are easy to operate. The instructions for how to set it up are very easy and almost self-explanatory if you have any technological ability whatsoever. Instructions come in layperson's language and are not confusing at all.

Reviews.Title: My new Visio E701i-A3 TV
Reviews.Author: M. Wang
Reviews.Content: The TV finally came. The delivery was cordial and careful. The setup is easy and smooth. The image quality of this TV is excellent. The picture is sharp, the color is vivid. I used an antenna to receive TV signals from local digital channels. The receiver of the TV seems is not as good as that of my other TV's. It could not pick up some channels. But for those channels it can receive, the picture is stable and sharp. I noticed the TV programs received over the air have the 720p to 1080i resolutions. But from a Blu Ray dvd player, I can get the 1080p signal, and then, the picture quality is really  marvelous. The remote control is a little bit sluggish. Sometimes, if you press a key, that key is received by the TV two times. So when you want to switch to channel 2, you may end up switching to channel 22. The speakers of the TV is facing the back of the TV. If you stand on the back of the TV, you can hear the sound more clearly, and often louder. I plan to connect the sound output of the TV to an audio amplifier with better speakers to correct this problem. The network connection feature is good. I enjoy watching HD footage from Youtube. I purchased this TV for $1598 at Amazon.com. After all, I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: 60" Vizio
Reviews.Author: annajo
Reviews.Content: We had a Vizio one size smaller and put that on bedroom wall. This we mounted on family room wall. We've had really good luck with Vizio TVs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and great price
Reviews.Author: Bob's Computer Service
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear picture and great sound. The smart tv works great. I will be buy a couple for my kids. Well worth the 200.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware ... get THIS model and not a "similar" one
Reviews.Author: T&S; Enterprises "th"
Reviews.Content: This TV is super!But... leave out the little bitty " i " after the E241 and you won't get Wi-Fi (and IEEE) and it won't be "smart."  You'll probably get it cheaper, but the tears will flow.Likewise, don't go for the smaller 22" screen at the cheaper price... you'll again be disappointed and may miss the change in product model definition that follows clicking on the BOX for that item.  RTP  ... read the picture (problem)!Interesting also is the remote.  Since there's no more Bluetooth in the Vizio Corral, one may expect pointing directly at the TV.  Not so, this remote seems to have side-lights (IR)... works however.  No keyboard is not terrible, the menu has a logical keypad built in.  The smart part works like you'd expect, only better.  Our Wi-Fi router is not extra special but the HD picture flows through with no noticeable difference in that and the wired connect... also built into the TV.  Put the wire in and the Wi-Fi switches automatically off and the wired connect comes up.  Vice versa as well, once the setup is complete.Finally a small screen with ALL the bells and whistles.  (Good work, Vizio ...Six stars!)

Reviews.Title: A Tale of 2 Televisions
Reviews.Author: William Hitchcock "Tech savvy old man"
Reviews.Content: I chose this particular television (Vizio E320i-AO) because of the review it received at CNET and also my son recommended Vizio since he has 3 of them. The tv arrived quickly (thanks Amazon Prime), package was undamaged and I waiting a couple days before I installed it. I set it up and it seemed as if all was fine. A couples days later I noticed a stuck pixel towards the upper left corner. I was hoping it would go away after a few on off cycles, but several days later it was still stuck in the purple mode. Then one night while watching a program, I went to adjust the volume but it didn't work, I then tried the channel up/down button and got no response. I tried to turn it off and could not...even tried the off button on the side. I had to unplug the tv and reconnect power before things would work again. I notified Amazon and it was an amazingly painless process to return the tv and get a replacement. The new Vizio E320i-AO arrived in 2 days and I removed the first one from the wall and set up the second. Now, this is where I noticed a difference. Even though both televisions had the exact same model numbers on the back, there were differences between the 2. The first was lighter, had buttons on the upper left side and the energy sticker said $6 a year average cost to operate. The second was a bit heavier, had a thicker plastic back (I had to buy longer M4 screws to attach to the same wall mount brackets). The buttons on the second tv were on the lower left side and the energy sticker indicated $8 per year average to operate. I decided to look at images of the Vizio E320i-AO online and all that I could find were the same as the second tv that I got. Even the box for the second tv was different than the first one. I don't understand, unless Amazon was trying to get rid of old stock??? Amazon, can you answer that one? Amazon also offered me $30 credit if I would keep the  defective first tv...which I declined.Now for the review of the second set. It works perfectly, the colors are great, the remote never fails and the Vizio apps are pretty good. CNET's review was spot on for the TV, I suggest you watch it. The backlit LED is nice, but it does make the TV a bit thicker....but who watches from the side? Hanging it the wall is easy as the tv is less than 20lbs. Viewing angles are decent and I haven't noticed and blurring or tearing, but really haven't watched anything that would really test it either. The wireless connection works extremely well for me, but I also connected a wireless router to my LAN just to serve the tv. The sound is adequate, but I would like to get a sound bar with a wireless sub...that would make this tv a 10 out of 10.Overall, I am quite pleased with the television and would indeed recommend this set to others who want a 32" tv in a smaller room or perhaps a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Just got it
Reviews.Author: Jim Deli
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is quite a step up from my old 35 inch TV. I'm still having problems getting it online but that was not the reason I bought it. The tech support is very good.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: great tv...loving it....;we like the wi-fi access and the size is great for watching sports, etc....good sound.....would make the purchase again....

Reviews.Title: Audio...ummm
Reviews.Author: Ruthie
Reviews.Content: *This review is for the 24" tv*As far as visual goes, this is an awesome tv. I love the connectivity with NetFlix, Yahoo, Amazon, etc. The one thing that drove me crazy until I pulled out an old set of pc speakers was the sound. I found that the "standard" sound, set to "rock" was better than the "surround." We're getting a sound bar soon, but until then, these pc speakers are it...but if we didn't have them, I'd be really irritated.So, lesson is...if you don't have some kind of external sound system (it has digital and analogue connections), you're going to grind your teeth...that is if audio is an issue for you at all.Other than that though, it's an awesome tv.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv.
Reviews.Author: SueMo
Reviews.Content: Installed in kitchen.Perfect size, clean design. Works great with awesome sound and pic quality.Took only seconds to set up smart tv and wireless.

Reviews.Title: High Quality at a Great Value
Reviews.Author: Chassica Kirchhoff
Reviews.Content: The features of this tv, the first my husband and I have purchased in many years, are comparable to much more expensive products at a fraction of the price. In addition, its design is attractive and the display is crisp. My only complaint is that the packaging appeared to have been opened when we received it via fedex, although all the components were included.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: session62
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived within 2 days. It was easy to set up and we had scanned in the channels, all within 15 minutes. We love all the apps that came preloaded. We are thinking about purchasing another one for the office.

Reviews.Title: Very clear picture
Reviews.Author: Rick Perkins
Reviews.Content: This TV is great!  I like the fact that the black plastic around the edge is very thin and the picture is very clear.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Joe J.
Reviews.Content: 70", thin and light, internet connectivity, great picture, functional remote, what's not too love!?IMO Vizio hit it out of the park with this one. Great quality for the price paid, Squaretrade warranty give piece of mine, and amazon white glove delivery kept me from hauling it up the stairs to the media room.VERY happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: TV for sewing room
Reviews.Author: B. DENTON "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: Great purchase!  Now I can sew and watch golf tournaments at the same time.Great picture, easy to use, great price.  Might purchase another!

Reviews.Title: best bedroom tv on the market
Reviews.Author: Andrew Glinski
Reviews.Content: i only own vizio products.  just got this lil smart tv for my bedroom. its the perfect price, size and does everything.  I cut the cord back in 2009.  just wifi tv for me. i own the vizio costar too .  love it

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good size
Reviews.Author: Jay Bingham
Reviews.Content: Needed something perfect for my bedroom and this TV fit the bill.  The picture quality is solid and it has all the smart tv functions you'll need.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV with a nice picture
Reviews.Author: Brent Walden
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for a few months now and so far it meets all of my expectations. Its a really nice tv for the price and I can't think of anything bad to say about it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected performance.
Reviews.Author: MikeandTrina
Reviews.Content: We were torn between this Vizio and the more expensive Sharp television.  We decided on this one because of the positive reviews we read and the fact that it was about $200 less than the Sharp.  The entire family has been amazed at the picture quality of this television.  I am sure under lab conditions with actual electronic testing equipment that this one would not compete well with more expensive sets, but for a casual viewer just watching television it is incredible.  We were all blown away the first time we watched the 1970's show Gilligan's Island on this set via Netflix.  You feel like you are looking out of a window instead of watching television.  I have no idea how they can make a 40 year old show look so realistic, but it really is impressive. In fact, at times it looks almost 3D it is so realistic (although this is not a 3D set).  The only weakness that this television has is that the speakers are not very loud, so we usually turn on a sound bar that we had previously purchased from Walmart.  The sound bar supplements the TV speakers very well, especially with the high frequency sounds.  With the bottom/back mounted speakers of the TV the sounds are a little muffled sounding, but the sound bar completely correct that.  Overall we think this television is a great value and we are extremely pleased with the decision to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Good tv at a good price
Reviews.Author: Richard DeCosmo
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd vizio tv that we have purchased and used.  The picture is very good and the installation was very easy.  Everything has worked as it was intended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Victoria Klein
Reviews.Content: Just the TV for my boys' rooms, easy to set up and to regulate time-of-use when accessed thru my AirPort Extreme!

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: kw
Reviews.Content: This model met all that I expected.  I was looking at Samsung's SmartTV, but I have a lot of those extra features in my XBOX.  This was the right price, the right features and the quality of the picture is excellent.  Only downside is the start up seems a bit long.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE TV
Reviews.Author: MAT
Reviews.Content: The TV is definitely not smart.Everything is very slow.The reach of the wifi is literally 15 ft. Any more than that and it will drop the signal, and won't be able to find it without restarting the tv. If you are lucky it wont freeze, which takes a few minutes to unfreeze, and then you have to start the whole thing again. Really annoying if you are using netflix, even more annoying if you are watching amazon or something else because at least netflix has a quick button.If you are getting this tv, do not get it for the "smart" feature. It is very dumb in that respect.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is great, smart tv is very chunky and laggy
Reviews.Author: DANI
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for $700 on amazon, and its beautiful, clean design,with really nice sound for in unit speakers. My only qualm with the tv is the smart tv software is very laggy and slow. It does work fine and you can watch hulu netflix etc, but it just doesnt feel very nice to use. I would highly recommend buying the qwerty remote for this TV its only like 20 bucks on amazon and it helps when logging into your streaming accounts, or using the facebook app. unfortunately no HBO Go on here yet. All around for the price this is a great buy compared to the competitors whose prices are significantly higher.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the money
Reviews.Author: santajp
Reviews.Content: I'm no tech snob, but after getting burned by my last bargain TV purchase, I researched this time, and I'm happy to report that this one lives up to the great reviews! It was easy to set up and easy to use. Picture, color, sound quality and TV interface are high quality. My only complaints are minor: the remote is small, with small, hard-to-read and -feel buttons. It's handy to have a smart TV, but this TV's built-in interface for Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, etc., is not as complete or as easy to use as the Roku Box interface.

Reviews.Title: A great tv at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Hunt "MsCaliGurl"
Reviews.Content: We upgraded our 3yr old 47in. Panasonic HD tv, and this Vizio was such a great investment. I've had the tv for 5 months now and it is worth every cent I paid. The screen is huge, 60 inches and it has a slim frame which really gives you a sense that this tv is all screen. The tv itself is thin, a little more than an inch thick. Which makes this tv lighter than most 60in tv's. This is a smart tv which means it comes with various apps that you can connect to over WiFi, such as, YouTube, Amazon video, Pandora and more. The picture quality is great and so is the sound quality. I would recommend this tv to whomever wants a bigger screen with a great picture at an even greater price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: AK from Trinidad
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely great! It got some bad reviews, none of which I agree with, shipping was great, the tv was easy to set up and picture and sound is very good. This is second Vizio I own, and has experienced no problems yet. My first Vizio is a 42" and is 6 years old, my new 60" is one month old and is has no problems like those experienced by others, most of the problems others have is simply an adjustment issue. I definitely recommend this Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Sleek Design, Still Needs Work
Reviews.Author: glspark2007
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price for this TV, it's a Smart TV, LED, Vizio. It's got a lot of things going for it, from the sleek design to easy set up. There are a lot of things to like.But there are also some things to dislike, some very frustrating things. I am having a lot of problems with some of the apps, especially Netflix (which is the main app that I use). It tends to load, play a video for a while, then freeze, and disconnect. I've contacted Netflix, tried all of their troubleshooting. They tell me it's nothing on their end. So, then I called Vizio, they checked my connection and tell me that it's strong and my TV is working fine. Vizio did mention that because Internet TVs are new, the servers aren't as good as what you would get in a computer or even a game console. As a result, even if an app like Netflix is running fine on your computer you may have problems on the TV (especially if you have a lot of devices hooked up to your Internet, which I do). Vizio and Netflix (I called them again) both told me that there is some sort of problem, and they are working to get an update out. But in the mean time, nothing else can be done.So, all this to say, nice TV with definite problems to still be worked out.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: DWB
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new VIZIO tv. The picture and sound are quite acceptable. It comes with lots of great features. I had to return my first one due to a purple haze that covered part of the screen...almost like someone ran a magnet over it or something. Other than that, the wireless connectivity seems to be a bit weaker than some other devices I have had in the same place. But when the Internet connects, it is extremely fast. Netflix starts a movie in about a second. I'd recommend this tv to anyone despite a couple minor limitations.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, great value, meets expectations
Reviews.Author: Seattle Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Needed a small TV for a bedroom & wanted it to have network access for content streaming.  Though the specs say it is not DLNA certified it did come pre-loaded with a Media app which easily & immediately accessed my content server software on our home network (via hardwire Ethernet).  Everything was fast & easy to get going, and it allowed Internet access even though I skipped the registration info during initial first-time setup.  Picture is good, remote is competent though most button labels are hard-to-read tiny, and on-screen browsing of menus is reasonable.  Only thing I don't like is the easy-access buttons on the remote for pay services labeled Amazon, Netflix, etc.  We don't use those services, and don't really care for that sort of corporate collusion. Having those apps pre-loaded in the TV is more than enough.

Reviews.Title: sound issues
Reviews.Author: Pam Girouard
Reviews.Content: Love this TV except for one annoying thing...occasionally when I turn it on I have no volume. I have to turn it off and then back on to have volume.

Reviews.Title: Vizio is the best!!
Reviews.Author: Rudy A. Leuver Jr. "rudedude"
Reviews.Content: That's right I said it! And I will stick by my review. I've always been a huge fan of vizio so i figured that going for the 70" would not be a tough decision at all. I just purchased the 70"e701i Razor at Costco and not only was it way less then all the overpriced samsungs, Sonys, sharps etc.. I think the picture is as good or even better!! Save your money!!! Buy this TV!! I have a 5-1 surround sound hooked into it and it is off the charts!!!! Vizio never dissapoints!!'

Reviews.Title: Good TV. But keep the box.
Reviews.Author: N. Hogue
Reviews.Content: TV Looks great. The picture is fantastic and the apps are easy to use, if a little slow. But that's natural with any built in application I'm finding.The only trouble was after 14 days I got a red line down the tv. one of the rows went out. Unable to resolve this though Amazon sent an exchange which I received soon and the company kindly delivered and took the old one same day. They of course offer to take the box when they deliver it, don't. If it happens to you you need this box to return it. Sure the new one might work out as well but if out of stock, out of luck.Other than that this new one has had no troubles, the picture is great, sharp, crisp, the blacks are deep. Once I turned off motion smoothing everything is just wonderful.

Reviews.Title: White balance
Reviews.Author: DanT "Dan"
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV. It's actually replacing a old 25 yo tv that is in my bathroom.Sound is OK for a LED tv. Not much bass, but very clear sound. The only thing I haven't been able to do yet is get a good balance of light and the balance of things with a lot of white on the screen. I'm still adjusting. I haven't noticed the same problem with my 55" Panasonic 3-d TV. I wish there were an adjustment for white balance! I've been using it a week now and am happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Everett Daviage
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert, but the TV was exactly what I needed. It fit the budget and the room and has a crisp picture. Not too overly complicated to use.

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This TV has lived up to everything I thought it would be.  The delivery service was on time, not the most knowledgeable guys but effective.  I am still learning how to use everything, but as I said so far so good.  The only complaint would be the sound quality.  The speakers are not that great, but can easily be fixed with a sound bar or surround sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for price
Reviews.Author: Max A. Geyer
Reviews.Content: I've only had the TV for about a week, but am very impressed with its performance. Excellent price for the picture size and the many state-of-the-art features it offers. High quality video and sound, which makes it excellent for movie viewing. I love the internet features (Wi-Fi, ethernet connections), since my wife and I watch many Netflix movies.

Reviews.Title: Use THX Setup
Reviews.Author: Richard Tomei
Reviews.Content: Use the THX Video Setup.  You will get a GREAT picture.  The remote control is worthless but, good enough to set up your universal remote.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture and value
Reviews.Author: Orbiter
Reviews.Content: Getting a new TV can be a daunting process, especially with the huge number of different technologies, manufacturers and designs out there. There are even variances from model to model, where component faults can cause costly failures. My previous Vizio 50" plasma TV was very reliable, so I decided to try this one based on its positive reviews and it doesn't disappoint. The screen is absolutely massive, yet the TV itself doesn't feel excessively heavy. Heat output is minimal as well.The picture is essentially what you make of it - there are so many adjustments and such fine grain control over the many filters, motion engine features and such that you can tune the picture to look exactly as you want it to. The noise reduction features can adapt perfectly to the source, be it old grainy film, games or TV shows. I'm also unable to detect any bright spots on the panel either, a common problem with LED/LCD TVs. The contrast ratio is very good, not quite plasma levels but the picture is so stable that I prefer it over the heat and reliability issues I've had with plasmas in the past.The "smart TV" features are also pretty cool. The interface is pretty clunky in some areas, but I consider these features to be extras and I don't base my purchasing decisions on them. The TV has a USB interface that allows you to play back some types of media, but I noticed that MKV files don't play. The built-in speakers are just okay, but frankly if you have a TV this big and no home theater sound system to go with it you're doing it wrong to begin with. I don't know if the stand was updated in later versions of this TV, but the one that came with mine is very sturdy and perfectly suited to the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a bedroom/office/den
Reviews.Author: Larry Clever
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for an HDTV for a bedroom/office/den then this is a great choice. It has great video quality and is all you need in terms of resolution for this size television. The availability of apps on this TV puts it well ahead of other tvs at this size and price range.

Reviews.Title: not all that good after all
Reviews.Author: Donville Edghill
Reviews.Content: after only having the tv for 4 months the remote stopped working and the power button on the side of the tv does not work ..after researching seems this is a constant problem with this brand....i will not be able to watch tv if i unplug it an then replug again...will have to purchase new remote, wonder how long that would work

Reviews.Title: VIZIO ROCKS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Howell
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeded my expectations in every way. The picture is incredible. I've run 1080p videos directly from the flash drive and the picture is awesome. The setup was very easy and the set is packed with useful features. It's not my first HD TV but by far the best. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Reviews.Title: 70 inch Visio tv
Reviews.Author: John R. Kimes
Reviews.Content: The size and clarity is perfect for my room.  I replaced a 50 inch plasma. The wifi is great and the automatic tie in with Amazon Prime.,  Netflix etc. is very handy. If you want to upgrade to a larger Tv in an affordable price range I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had Known Before I Purchased...
Reviews.Author: Gwennie
Reviews.Content: Big Screen and Big Sound go together - Right?  Unfortunately, not all VIZIO apps (ie NETFLIX) are compatible with home theater surround sound systems.After speaking with, and confirming this fact with several of VIZIO's wonderfully friendly customer service agents, I was asked to be patient.Apparently, the company is working with NETFLIX on an update to allow home theater compatibility.I'm hugely dissapointed.In addition to the cost of the TV, I invested in a surround sound system that doesn't currently work with a major source of my movies -- NETFLIX.  Given that VIZIO highlights the accessibility of their applications when promoting their TVs, I feel that this is something that should have been tested and worked out before launching the product!  So... I'm unhappily waiting and hoping that there will, in fact, be an update.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV and you cannot beat the price!
Reviews.Author: dandeeswish
Reviews.Content: I was very hesitant about getting this TV just because of some problems that people were reporting/experiencing, from forums and comments, etc.. I took a chance though and have never had any problems at all. No lip sync, picture going out, etc.The only thing that I have noticed is a bit of bleeding from the TV's corners, when first starting up the TV, but this is a pretty common issue amongst "The Razors". Once you boot up the picture it's not even noticeable. I would recommend this TV to anybody that wants size, beautiful picture quality, can't common on sound much, as it runs through my receiver, and wants as much bang for the buck. This TV will not disappoint. Some of the Calibration settings that are posted in these comments are pretty amazing. Many thanks to the first woman that posted her calibrations. I have continued with these settings and the Picture quality is just more amazing-Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great TV...Shipping company sucks!
Reviews.Author: roosevelt
Reviews.Content: I love this TV...I was upset at the fact that it took so long to be delivered and actually thought about cancelling my order. I contacted Amazon and cancelled the order but called back the next day and cancelled the cancelled order and continued shipment. The staff at Amazon were very helpful and I realize that it wasn't their fault. Blame rested with the shipping company (Pilot). But the TV is GREAT! It is scary that it is so clean and crisp. It is a 3D TV without the 3D capability or the glasses. It is truly a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Was great while it worked
Reviews.Author: MM1016
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for just over 90 days. Then it died on me. Picture was great while it worked, but what good is that when it doesn't work anymore. Working with Vizio on getting a replacement but that process is a joke. Going on 3 weeks now and it may be here next week...maybe.Do yourself a favor and spend a little bit more money to a company that supports their products a whole lot better.TV = FAIL (though again picture was good for the 90 days that it worked)VISIO customer Service = FAIL

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Just a Regular Guy
Reviews.Content: I cannot imagine that there is a better 60 inch smart HDTV than this one.  The picture is spectacular.  The blur is basically nonexistent.  And I thought the smart TV functions worked extremely well.  I have seen TVs twice as expensive and I can say with confidence that this one is every bit is good.  Plus its Made in the USA, which should matter to you.  Don't waste your money on one of the fancier names.  This should be your choice.

Reviews.Title: beginning to wonder if it's really worth it...
Reviews.Author: Caitlin M Daniel
Reviews.Content: Initially, i ordered this from Amazon and received a broken TV. I had to immediately return it. I bought a new one from a local retailer instead; however, it's already had picture issues and has to be replaced by Vizio since i no longer have a picture. When it does work, it's awesome, but with the initial shipping issues and now the functionality issues, I'm beginning to wonder if it's really worth it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Vizio E500
Reviews.Author: William Brian Huskey
Reviews.Content: I bought an RCA 46" just before Christmas of last year.  What a mistake.  Went bad just after the warranty ran out (1 yr.)  Got the Vizio 50" from Amazon.  Beautiful colors and clarity.  Great Sound.  Linked it to internet for Netflix and emails.  I finally came into the 21st Century.  Highly recommend this Vizio product.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Patrick Russell
Reviews.Content: I bought mine from Walmart.com. It was refurbished and cost only $748.00. I paid an additional $160 to get a 4 year replacement warranty. I am very pleased so far. To be fair, I have only had it 4 days and have no idea why it was originally refurbished. I can tell you that, with some adjustments of the picture settings, it has a great picture. I consider myself a decent judge, I have 3 other flatscreens and am all about HD signal and Blu-rays. The picture is great. The audio of the TV is awful. Sounds very cheap. Luckily, I use a home theater for my sound, so it doesn't adversely affect me. I would recommend this TV for $1,000 bucks or under. I have not used the wifi much, because I have a large house and my wireless router is on the other end of the house. Also, the remote does not have dedicated buttons for each input mode. Irritating! Nevertheless,it has been a wonderful upgrade thus far from the Phillips 47-inch it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Great for Internet services.
Reviews.Author: Walter Carow
Reviews.Content: Use for Pandora, Netflix and others.Analog audio nice to stereo in place of just digital since speakers have no bass.Fits perfectly in existing cabinet.Wide angle viewing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV - Great Value
Reviews.Author: jobiemac
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative to say about this TV. It has all the features I wanted/needed. The only problem I have is that it turned out to be too small for the I had for it. Yes, I measured first. The slime frame is great and the features are easy to use.  Sound was pretty good and the picture very clear and crisp. The remote is clunky. BEWARE IT DOES NOT COME WITH A QWERTY KEYBOARD REMOTE. Amazon may have updated the description, but when I purchased it the description said it was included. If you are on the fence, buy it. You won't find a better TV for $700.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, Good Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Squally Ollie
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tv is beautiful.  The sound could be a little better.  About a week after buying it I noticed a green dot that stayed on the screen.  So I called customer service and sent in pictures and they had the TV replaced.  No problems with the replacement so far.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever.
Reviews.Author: Elisa
Reviews.Content: UPS just delivered my new purchase VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV. Talk about happy. Setup was a breeze.  After comparing pricing at all the store that sells this product, Amazon was the best choice.  Not only was the price in my budget I also got a $10.00 promo discount.  I purchased on Saturday and got on Monday.  It took on longer than 25 minutes to open the box to viewing. I'm a very happy customer. Thank you again Amazon.E.Pagan

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 32-inch Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Eva
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for bedroom.  Picture quality is excellent.  Easy set up.  It's super light-weight, like a PC monitor rather than a TV.

Reviews.Title: Really GREAT for the price.....
Reviews.Author: R. Jones "Retired&LovingIT;"
Reviews.Content: I love VIZIO TVs. First, the price is right. The setup, even with the Smart APPs is really easy. Be sure and have your login codes for your router, Netflix, Amazon, and other online services you have.Picture is bright and clear. Power savings is unreal......$6.00 a year to operate!.....

Reviews.Title: Excellent 32" TV at good value
Reviews.Author: Mr. Shopper
Reviews.Content: Purchased this set few weeks ago to use in a small sitting room.  Set up was a breeze and this being our first LED TV, the picture is outstanding!  This set is connected to Verizon Fios service without a set top box and it picked up over 100 channels in our location - very impressed.Features are excellent and some of the apps are rather handy.  About the only complaint is like many others expressed - remote buttons are simply too small.  (That cost the overall evaluation 1 star.)  But I ended up buying a universal remote and that took care of the issue.  We've since moved the set to a bedroom - a location much more suited for this type of use.  In its place we just purchased the exact same set but in a larger 42" and that should arrive soon.  We expect the same excellent experience and quality as shown by this so far.I'm very impressed with the Vizio brand.  The product seems well made, offers excellent value and makes a fine alternative to equally impressive but more costly brands (i.e. Samsung).  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: good price but not sure about quality
Reviews.Author: Jillian shatken
Reviews.Content: its a great price but i am a little worried- i have had less than a month, and already it has randomly shut off twice during use.also, it does take a little bit of time to boot up and turn on.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Picture was as nice as expected, wireless connection is strong (stronger than my iPad and my Galaxy S2), Netflix, Amazon and apps work smoothly.  I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Nice bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Todd Goldberg
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a bedroom and for this use it's the perfect size, nice picture, adequate sound.  For a living room or den would need a bigger screen and a sound bar or surround sound stereo system.  As other reviewers state the remote is a little small and the TV is a little slow to respond and start.  And the smart tv interface is not the smoothest.  But for the price it works great and has an excellent selection of online channels (Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, etc).  The remote has buttons for Netflix and Amazon but would like to see one for Hulu as well.  It also has a button for a new/upcoming service called MGo that doesn't even seem to exist yet.  Has plenty of inputs for BluRay player, computer, Ipod/Apple TV/Roku or whatever else you need.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Sometimes sound doesn't work...
Reviews.Author: DeAnn Cowman "Iowa Beach Dreamer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. Really like having Netflix and Amazon Prime Videos available through the tv. Picture is great, sound is great ... when it turns on.  I've had this tv for about 3 months now and maybe 6 times so far - at random times - the sound won't come on when I turn on the tv.  Turn the tv off, wait a few seconds and turn back on, the sound is fine. Will need to contact Vizio to see what's going on.  But overall happy with the purchase. Would've given 5 stars without the sound issue.

Reviews.Title: I know TV's, and this is an AMAZING value!
Reviews.Author: Martin Wormley
Reviews.Content: I am a Comcast technician, so needless to say I have seen it all when it comes to flaws with modern-day TV's. When I first started with Comcast, I had seen one Vizio fail after another and swore to never to buy one. Samsung TV's always were so solid with rarely any issues at all. However, over the years I have seen Vizio TV's become more of a popular brand with many people recommending the brand to me. After seeing this TV in Best Buy for the same price as on Amazon, I decided to go for it. I will admit, I was furious when I was getting the HDMI audio-lip sync problem right off the bat when I started watching it. I knew it wasn't a cable box issue because I just swapped from my Samsung 50 inch LED to the new one with no issues before. Looking at the bad reviews, I learned that the old firmware was the source of the issue and after 2 days of waiting, I turned on the TV with the message: "Your firmware has been updated to 1.1.5". Since then, absolutely NO issues whatsoever, the picture rivals if not BEATS my Samsung LED! The smart features are solid although I don't use them very often since I use my XBOX more so for the apps connected to it. Overall, for the value this TV just CANNOT be beat, and you'd be a fool to get any other TV in this size.

Reviews.Title: In-Freaking-Sane
Reviews.Author: BPP
Reviews.Content: I'm loving everything about this TV. If you're reading this review and it's buried under other reviews, you're just like me, you research the crap out of big purchases and especially you're TV. If you haven't seen it already, search this model on CNET for a full video review where they call this the best 60" for the price. On the topic of CNET's review though, I will add that I disagree with them on suggesting that the OS it runs on is wonky. If you want to see a smart TV with a wonky OS, check on LG. That thing is terrible! But I digress. I love this TV and doubt you'll find a better value (price vs product) in the market today.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: I replaced an older 32 inch lcd which was actually larger. This product came on time and left on my front porch with vizio box for all to see (security?). TV was easy to install (square mount) and plug into cable. Awesome picture. Better than my samsung plasma 63 inch (2012). It took awhile for wi-fi to connect. I think it is my router, not the tv.Highly recommended and well worth the price. I should have selected the 39 inch because it is the size of my old 32 inch (larger border). Don't pass this one up!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great deal, Ignore the haters.
Reviews.Author: DanielBond86
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about getting this TV after reading some of the negative reviews, but I finally bought it and I'm glad I did. Shipping was free quick and easy, was delivered right into my apartment with no problems. Waited 4 hours before turning it on due to the temperature adjustment then began setting it up.  Before this I had a 42 inch Dynex and when I set up this new TV I was blown away at how much bigger it is, the difference between 42" and 60" really is bigger then you'd think.  Make sure you can be at least 6 feet away from the TV when watching, or else you'll feel like you're in the first row at the movie theater. The picture is great, incredibly clear and sharp when watching blu rays or even playing 720p games.  Sadly when watching HD cable it doesn't look as good (though not bad) but that is because HD tv is in 1080i and not 1080p like a blu ray is. A number of people have complained that the speakers in the TV suck or are no good, but I actually find them to be just fine, and since the TV is so big, the two built in speakers are pretty spread out so you get a full sound (though I do recommend buying or using additional surround sound speakers for the added benefit of a sub and more power).I didn't set up or use any of the internet apps because come on, that's not why I bought the TV and I have a laptop, phone and PS3 to do all that on. The remote is good enough, and the interface to use while messing with all the settings on the TV is real easy.  The only complaint I can think of about the TV is when you have the backlighting on (which you don't need on if you turn off the ambient light sensor) and the screen is totally black, you can see some kind of uneven lighting at the edges of the screen. This bothered/freaked me out at first because I saw other people complaining about this issue, but as I said before, just turn off the backlighting and it goes away, and even if you don't turn off the backlighting, as soon as something comes on the screen that isn't completely all black, it's gone.The smooth motion (120hz) looks awesome once you get used to it, but some people just don't like it so luckily you can turn it off easily in the picture menu. I've had this TV for a week and I'm still excited to sit down and watch a movie or play PS3 on it because its just so clear, big and makes everything into an immersive experience, and if that's not money well spent, then I don't know what is.

Reviews.Title: The Best Investment Ever!!
Reviews.Author: natasha dennis
Reviews.Content: I give this Vizio a 5 star hands down Product Rating on a customer satisfaction level.I bought this 60" Smart LED Razor thin Monster because I needed to upgrade. So I did.first off it came faster than a speeding bullet, and delivered by very nice gentlemen.  I love the television and the customer service.Everything is working a okay and it couldn't be any better. I will say that I had a Mitsubishi 60" and if this Vizio is a 60" as well the one of these televisions are misleading the consumers because My Smart TV is by far the largest 60" I've ever had LOL. I will be recommending this product to all of my Family members, FB friends, fellow cowers and students, especially to my mom and dad.if you're thinking about getting this Smart TV. . . . STOP and don't THINK just buy it

Reviews.Title: smart tv, smart purchase
Reviews.Author: LJ
Reviews.Content: After quite a bit of time researching smart tvs, I decided to go with this Vizio. Amazon reviews helped me make my final decision.I ordered it on Monday and I had it on Wednesday, I didn't expect it to arrive that soon!  I'm amazed at how happy I am with this tv, especially for a tv well under $300.00. It comes with the basic instructions for setting up, which are ample. If you need more detailed instructions, you need to go the the Vizio web site and print the instructions for the specific model.That is my only minor complaint.The picture is great, so 720p is enough for me. The sounds is ok. I know some complained about the sound quality but it's fine. I did decide to connect the tv to my stereo system which very easy to do. The basic instructions clearly indicate how to make all your connections. I had a couple of questions when I set up Hulu, tech support is there 24/7 and I found them to be very helpful.I definately recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i-AO LED Smart TV
Reviews.Author: D. W. Shirey
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV. It is lightweight, compact, and the LED screen makes the operation extremely cost efficient.The picture is very good for a 720p, good color and sharp focus. The only problem I have had is connecting to the wifi. Occasionally it won't connect unless I use the network menu to locate the wi-fi signal, and test the connection. At first this was annoying,  but now is only a minor inconvenience. This is the only reason for the 4 stars, otherwise I would have given it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for my Needs
Reviews.Author: Glory
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect for my apartment! Its just the right size for our small living room. I was worried that I would have to connect it through ethernet to my network but wifi works great! It probably helps that my router is in the same room no more than 10 feet away from the tv itself.I also saw a few reviews about the sound not being so great, but I've found it to be pretty good and it can definitely get loud. I've only had it up to about 25 which I think is about 1/4 if not only 1/3 of how loud it can actually be.Set up was simple and the apps work well. The only thing I don't like is that the Amazon Instant video app only shows up as a side bar so its kind of hard to see and navigate.If you're looking for a 32" smart tv, this is certainly the one.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV....
Reviews.Author: Akanksha
Reviews.Content: After much research for value and quality, me and my wife settled for this TV. Its great and we enjoy big picture from the comforts of our home.

Reviews.Title: TV turns off
Reviews.Author: Tanya M
Reviews.Content: Bought this at Costco for a great price! But it suddenly, without warning turns off. Sleep timer isn't set or on, etc.I called Costco and they said there's a recall on the tv. Guess I'm returning it and getting something else  :(

Reviews.Title: 60 inch vizio tv
Reviews.Author: Rodney sherrill
Reviews.Content: great tv should have bought it earlier would recomend this tv to anyone who wants a big screen tv . i love it

Reviews.Title: Great TV...it wont Dissapoint.
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this HDTV about a month ago.  I did a lot of research beforehand and almost went with a Panasonic but backed off because of glare issues.  Overall, I'd rate the TV 9/10.  Colors are super vivid, amazing.  Watching National Geographic on PBS is an awesome experience.  There is a lot of negative information on blacks. Well, black are blacks and Downton Abbey is dark show (a lot of dark rooms and black suits) and I used it to tune in the color (black level).  Overall, black level is fine with me.  I could tell from one episode to another that Downton Abbey changes the lighting in each room.  Overall, black level is not an issue with me.  Watching any TV show, sport, or Movie will not disappoint.  The TV show Survivor is so vivid you might as well be there on the beach with them.  Now if TV channel isn't High Def you wont see high definition and you can't blame that on the TV. In regard to sound, I was pleased.  The glare is minimum.  There are a total of five windows in our living room.  I ended up using the pre defined sports option to watch shows and turned off a majority of the options to find a picture that is pleasing. In regard to set-up, it couldn't be any easier. You hook up a few wires and the TV autoscans channels.  The netflix/amazon/youtube options are great.  The Netflix wifi options pulls in a better picture than our ROKU.  The remote is award winning.  You'll see once you begin to use it. The TV is 120 hz and basketball and Daytona 500 came in with precision.  No speed issues.  Personally after reading numerous reviews I can only assume that competitors are posting bad reviews on this specific TV because in my honest opinion, it is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Steven Ross
Reviews.Content: This TV is great there was no problems what so ever with it. Great Buy!!! I would absolutely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jacob Vasquez
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price! Super thin, great picture and the smart features are great. Keyboard on remote really comes in handy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Merle Pierce
Reviews.Content: Great buy, Great Price, excellent running tv, wish I had cable internet cannot use all the features, but it gives me everything I need and wanted... Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: sk25230
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy online and the TV works and looks great. I cannot imagine a better price point product for a smart TV of this size.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Jason P Mayforth
Reviews.Content: This is a great television for the price.  This tv was easy to setup and looked absolutely amazing right out of the box.  It has a great remote with a keyboard on one side.  It makes it easy to use the tv.  You could not ask for a better 60 inch for the price.

Reviews.Title: Super great picture and price!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I have had a Vizio 47" flat screen for five years and it has been perfect. I wanted a bigger screen so I went Vizio again and I am not disappointed at all. It is slim, beautiful and perfoms like a rock star. great price too compared to other brands with a 60" screen.

Reviews.Title: Slow Refresh Rate
Reviews.Author: John Lardner
Reviews.Content: TV overall is excellant however there is a slight problem with the refesh rate.  A slight blur if the picture.

Reviews.Title: nice picture
Reviews.Author: suxiaoxiao
Reviews.Content: i like it so far. will see if it lasts long, but the pic and sound are good, I don't feel i should pay more for any other brand name if the brand really means much these days for TVs.

Reviews.Title: Works and Looks Great!
Reviews.Author: Dan Z
Reviews.Content: Amazon brought it into my house and tested it.  I put on the stand and everything works perfectly.  Great picture, connected to my wifi easily.  Works great!  I've had Vizio's for the past five years and I've never had a problem.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: I dont know a lot about electronics but I like it. It's very big and beautiful =) My first tv was a Vizeo and so far that brand has not disappointed me.

Reviews.Title: Amazballs!!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph "joseph curcuru"
Reviews.Content: Best TV ever!!!Recieved it and everything about it is great!!!It looks and sounds amazing!!!I recomend this tv to everyone.

Reviews.Title: 1 month in...
Reviews.Author: Jesse Robinson
Reviews.Content: I paid exactly 888$ and not a penny more for this TV. It looks great, the Wifi works great and it has a nice sleek frame which keeps it from being bulky. Looking for a good value with good results, then look no further. Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: One of the best 32" HDTVs on the market.
Reviews.Author: C. Andew Currie
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting an HDTV for some time now, but the prices weren't in my budget. Up until this point we had a small tube style TV with built in DVD player we occasionally used, but I wanted something more. I did a lot of research on HDTVs in the 32" range. I was originally tempted by a TCL slim profile TV, but the price shot up over $100 before I took the plunge. I had looked into a Sceptre TV and a a Vizio too.I decided on Vizio because their TVs seem to have universally good reviews, with good build quality and good picture quality. This particular TV is one of Cnet's top picks for the 32" class. I chose to spend a little more on this Smart TV because I was interested in the built-in apps and wifi connectivity. We don't have cable so being able to use apps to watch the things we want VS paying more for a bunch of channels I don't want sounded appealing. I got mine on sale here for $289. It took about a week to arrive with Super Saver shipping (I didn't have prime yet), but arrived undamaged.I'm very happy I made this purchase. First of all, the picture quality is terrific. Really sharp, great colors and shadows, no distortion in fast action sequences (I watched the Avengers and Transformers to put it to the test). At may be 720p but at this size you can't tell the difference between 720p and 1080p. I can't at least.Build quality is very good to. It seems nice and sturdy and even managed to survive being knocked over by a cat without a scratch (thank goodness, that was day 2 of ownership!). I also like the slim frame, it makes it look more elegant.Sound quality is good I think. Much less tinny than the Sceptre I was looking at. I'll probably buy some dedicated speakers at some point (I was thinking maybe the Sony SSF-5000), but its perfectly adequate.We still don't have cable, but I its not a problem. I got Netflix which has been great. Most of the shows I want to watch are available. I also just got Prime, which works well, but doesn't have as much selection that you don't have to pay rental fees for. For example, Futurama costs $1 per episode with Prime, but happily Netflix has all 9 seasons and all 4 movies. But I digress. It has a nice selection of apps including Youtube and hulu. Wireless streaming with Youtube doesn't work well in HD (takes forever to load), but Netflix and Prime are well optimized for streaming. The video quality is great most of the time and they adjust to keep the video from stopping to buffer most of the time.I ordered the tv with a couple AmazonBasics HDMI cables and Sony BDPS185 blu-ray player. Haven't actually played a blu-ray yet, but boy my DVDs never looked so good. The difference between composite and HDMI connection is profound.I've had the TV for about a month now and couldn't be happier. It fits perfectly in our small apartment and movie night is much more enjoyable, plus catching up on all the shows I've missed is awesome. Assuming it holds up, I'll definitely buy Vizio again.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Rick Hoss
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Was easy to program audio and video systems.  I would highly recommend this product as price is reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy from Amazon warehouse deals
Reviews.Author: Mud
Reviews.Content: I bought this from Amazon warehouse deals. It arrived in a flimsy generic box surrounded by two small pieces of foam. The description said it had only minor imperfections. The TV was bent i.e. concave  by about 3/4". This was NOT a minor defect. If anyone at Amazon warehouse had looked at it for more than 30 seconds they would have seen the defect. Took 4 weeks to get the shipping company to come pick it up and to then get my refund. A huge waste of time.

Reviews.Title: We loved it ....but disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Mandy's Mom
Reviews.Content: We received the Vizio E601-A3 60" tv on Monday, February 4, 2013. We were very excited about it and it really looked great in the corner we set it in. We had no complaints until two days later while we were streaming a movie from Netflix the sound suddenly went up to full volume and the tv started making a loud popping noise. We turned the tv off and started the movie over and all went well. We had no more problems until three days later while watching the evening news, the same thing happened again. We turned the tv off and right back on again and it seemed to be okay. We decided if it happened again we would just change channels and see if that straighened it out without having to turn the tv off. About ten minutes after the State of the Union address came on, it happened again. I used the remote and went up a channel. The loud noise and loud popping sound was still sounding but the screen went blank. I tried to use the remote to change channels. Nothing happened. I tried to turn the tv off with the remote and it would not respond. The remote was totally useless. We had to turn the tv off with the button on the side of the tv. All this happened within eight days after we got the tv. Needless to say, I contacted Amazon and returned the tv. Right now we are just undecided about which tv to try next. We really loved all the features about this tv, especially the remote control with the qwerty keyboard, but we might just wait until the new Vizios come out in March or April and try it again.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV. Couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After doing plenty of research, I was zeroing on a 60" Samsung or Panasonic. I stumbled on this TV and never looked back. I wasn't sure about Vizio, but I'm now a loyal fan.There are plenty of great reviews on here, so I'll call out the few things that have really stood out to me:- The cost. Incredibly affordable.- 4 HDMI ports- Image quality- Built in 802.11n- Built in Netflix (especially after hauling the PS3 from room to room)- Full keyboard integrated on the remoteAlso, check out the review by Kris, the one that has the most "helpful" responses, and use those image settings. It makes a big difference.  The picture is much sharper, brighter, and deep this way.One other thing I've learned since getting the TV,  the firmware will be automatically updated once the TV is connected to the internet.  There is no way to manually download or get the firmware pushed to the TV.  My TV updated to the latest firmware within 24 hours of setting it up. Piece of cake!Can't recommend this TV enough!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio E500i-A1
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: I really can't describe this television.  It is simply the best.  No cons about it..  I would absouteley recommend this set to anyone looking to spend their hard earned money on an HDTV.

Reviews.Title: pretty good for 3 days
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: tv was pretty good for three days.  nice picture, not totally awesome, but nice, couldnt complain for the price.  this morning the v button on the remote was pushed and the tv shut off.  now tv wont turn on.  tried different outlets, tried unpluging and re-plugging,  tried uplugging the power cord from tv and replugging, etc.  vizio customer support says repair is needed, power light wont even come on at the bottom of the tv.  will repost as square trade process developes. 2-21-20132-26-13: replacement tv to be delivered thurs 2-28-2013.  amazon has been awesome.  email them and they get back immediately.  as far as i'm concerned, customer service really couldnt be better.  it was a bummer the tv broke, but amazon has done everything they could to fix the issue and get me back to jumbo-tron heaven!  will repost with update on replacement.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV at a local best buy after price matching the 888.00 on Amazon, it's not comparable to the as sings and sonys out there, but for a 1/3 of the price I think I can handle a bit of missed colors and slight balance issues. I had to use some settings I found online to brighten up the picture, otherwise it's a bit dark. Great tv.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV, enhanced delivery service not so much
Reviews.Author: John Richards "John"
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a chance to put the TV through its paces, so this comment is mostly about Enhanced Delivery. It was supposed to include: "deliver your TV to any room suitable for testing, unpack it, ensure that it is working properly to guarantee no damage occurred during transportation, and dispose of all packaging material." The 2 delivery men did carry the package to the desired spot in my house, but none of the remaining services were done. Being a techie, this did not bother me since I enjoy unpacking a new gadget myself. But there could have been undiscovered shipping damage, and I was lucky that there wasn't any.

Reviews.Title: my review
Reviews.Author: Gregory Carpenter
Reviews.Content: works greatjust what I wantedwould reccomend this to any one that wants a vizio or flat screen tv

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to set up.  Remote is simple and highly functional.  Picture and sound are great.  I have been looking to "step up" for quite some time, I jumped on this when Amazon offered it for $888 with free shipping.  I continue to see this TV advertised for $999 elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: joshua m graham
Reviews.Content: Perfect quality - feels like everyone is on the room with me!!!  Great quality for the price ....get one - you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: fabulous picture
Reviews.Author: OCreviewer
Reviews.Content: i don't understand the criticism of this TV.  We have had this set for about two weeks and it works flawlessly.  The picture is indistinguishable from sets costing twice as much.  One criticism has been that the viewing angle is very narrow; my experience is that it has an extremely wide viewing angle.  we had a five year old Sony rear projection HD set; this one cost literally less than half as much and is a significantly better set.

Reviews.Title: Vizio television
Reviews.Author: Tarrika Alexander
Reviews.Content: This tv is so awesome, I didn't expect it to be so fantastic. It's nice and clear and the motion in it is out of this real, the picture is so real looking it looks like we're watching it right at the movie set.

Reviews.Title: 60 Inch Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Jim Tiller
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product. At an amazing price, $1000. Thought it would be years before LED prices dropped this low. I now have three Vizio flat screen TV's. They are fantastic, and energy efficient.

Reviews.Title: So So Satisfied!!!
Reviews.Author: ChasnDrmz
Reviews.Content: VIZIO knocked it out of the ballpark yet again!!!! This is an AWESOME TV for any tech savy person (being this is a SMART TV), especially if it's for a bedroom due to the size. I always do my research before making any hasty decisions and I am so glad I purchased this tv. It was a breeze to set up and we were even checking out a Netflix movie within 30 minutes out of the box.Also just to clear up a previous review.....this tv DOES have a sleep timer setting.If you are wondering should I or shouldn't I buy this tv definitely go for it!!! You won't be sorry!I am looking already at purchasing the same tv just a larger size for my livingroom!!! Sooo YES I would buy this tv again!!! Keep up the good work VIZIO!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Picked one up last night at a local store
Reviews.Author: J. Haggard
Reviews.Content: I was looking to build up my entertainment room, I had a 32" tv and wanted something much larger. After standing in a big box store last night looking at the various options I came across this one. The picture on it was not good, but I figured it had to be the store had some funky settings. It was next to another LED Tv that cost around $200 more, but I went with the vizio anyways thinking I could change the settings to make it work.I got it home in the back of my honda ridgeline truck, it fit perfectly in the bed with the tailgate closed, we got it carried upstairs easily with the wifes help and unboxed it. The TV is massive and when you first turn it on it walks you through a setup wizard.Once the TV was up and running the picture was good, but not great. At least not for watching Hockey. I went into the settings and found the TV had many sport modes, but hockey was not one of them! Anyways, after flipping through the various settings I found the "Vivid" setting and that made the picture of the hockey games crystal clear, you could see the ice clear as day, including the skate marks across the lines. The player uniforms popped. It was really amazing how clear the picture actually is.I've only had this tv going on 24 hours now but so far I love it. Yes the sound is not phenomenal. It's not bad but I had a sound bar I hooked up to it and use that.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: Health Nut
Reviews.Content: This smart TV has lived up to its name.  It is very easy to use, and there are a lot of good apps.  With special buttons on the remote you can bring up Netflix or Amazon Instant Video in one click.  There is also a qwerty keyboard on the back of the remote for fast typing.The TV itself is very thin and looks great.  The picture and sound are both very high quality.  Vizio is one of the cheaper brands of TV, but even at its discounted price, it competes with the top brand names.

Reviews.Title: great deal for price
Reviews.Author: Martin L Baroni
Reviews.Content: It's great for it's price. Features on TV nice and simple. VIZIO will really push it's extended warranty on you.  My only issue was about delivery was late.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for a 60 inch Led TV
Reviews.Author: Diharduncfan
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is awesome.  Also the TV is energy efficient.  The only complaints I have was where the component video input was on the TV.  Its a little more than halfway up on the backside of the TV making it to high for my six foot component video cable to fit since my TV is mounted on the wall.  I previously had a 50 inch TV mounted on the wall without this issue since the component video input on the TV were near the bottom of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've ever had!
Reviews.Author: Jacob Richan
Reviews.Content: The picture looks great, stunning HD quality.To be honest, I didn't buy the TV for the internet features.  I was basically going for size and HD quality at a reasonable price, the internet features were more just a bonus.  After exploring the online content available, along with the general usability of the apps I was actually quite impressed and I'll occasionally use these apps over the apple tv apps.Hands down, I would highly recommend this TV.  I'm throughly satisfied with my choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Michael Evans
Reviews.Content: For the price and quality of the Vizio TV it just can't be beat.  Home Theater reviewed it as one of the top TVs for 2012.  This and the 70" version.Vizio E601i-A3 LCD: $1,000Hailed by reviewer Tom Norton for offering great value, the E601i-A3 is remarkably thin for the price, offers built-in Wi-Fi with access to popular sites like Hulu Plus, and sports back-panel connections that won’t hinder wall mounting. Video processing is outstanding and the set delivers a high-resolution image with excellent color, “knife-sharp yet natural detail,” and excellent black-level performance. As Norton put it, “What you get here is the sort of flat-screen performance you couldn’t dream of a few years ago—at any price.” (HomeTheater.com, Read Full Review)

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E500i-A1 50-inch 120Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Clarence McCallum
Reviews.Content: My rating for this TV is short and sweet; and  I love the picture and the set up was very easy!Clarence

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This is my second Vizio and am so far very happy with it an the first one.  NIce and crisp, bright and great sounds.  Much more affordable than Samsung which seems to get really good reviews too. But for the price difference, check out Vizio too.  Good luck! Bill, Salem, Oregon

Reviews.Title: Awesome set
Reviews.Author: Mark S
Reviews.Content: Had this set for 3 months now. It is very nice. I love the remote and the apps. The kids love Youtube, they laugh for hours. The picture quality is good out of the box and awesome after some setup. The viewing angle is a bit limited, the color changes some and it takes a while to boot up. All in all this was an awesome purchase. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: TV is only half smart - no browser
Reviews.Author: TheDealMaster
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv 1/30/2013 from that big box store because I knew I could negotiate a $75 discount -  out the door for $875. In spite of several reviews detailing problem riddled experiences I took the leap. Of faith... It looked to me like most problems were related to sets manufactured towards the last half of 2012. My set was manufactured in mid January 2013 so felt a sense of confidence.  We will see.Out the box the picture did require some tweaking which was easily enough done using settings kindly posted here by another reviewer. One nice thing about this set is settings are unique to the input used, so your dvd could send different video characteristics than cable or satellite.This is marketed as a smart tv but it is only half smart since it does not have an internet browser. On the other hand using Netflix was easy to launch and streamed flawlessly through my wireless network - no hiccups whatsoever.  Speaking of wireless, that too was very easy to set up if not entirely intuitive but still easily enough done. Signal is very strong since the router is only 12 feet away.  Haven't used the other apps as yet.  I still want to connect the vga but only my desktop has that kind of connection and not practical to use that way.  I guess I'll research a wireless connection.Viewing from extreme angles is pretty darn good.  The resolution can be very sharp and I have to question the DirecTV signal input since my 46in Sony seems sharper on the same channel in some cases. That could be a function of my satellite which has a disengaged stabilizing rod that is causing some minor issues and will be reattached tomorrow. Hopefully that will correct what appears to be inconsistency between the two sets.Sound from the set is not that important to me since I have externalized it so I have no input there.  It sounded ok when I did open it up, though.I did call Vizio support for some question regarding initial setup and they were very helpful.Once again about the resolution, there are some tweaks in the menu settings that you must do to get the full HD experience. Initial viewing gave me some pause which gave way to relief after fixing.Less than a week in I'm pretty happy so far.  Maybe I'll kick to 5 stars after more exercise.  Those darn bad reviews scare me.  I'm considering an extended warranty through Vizio.And thanks to all the other reviewers here that helped me with my purchase.Update 2/17/2013 - still working just fine.  Discovered that pausing netflix for maybe a half hour (dinner) the tv just turns off.  But no worries, after the 20 second boot up we were right back to where we paused (The Grey with Liam Neeson.  Don't waste your time, btw).  The blacks are not as black as my Sony but I can overlook that pretty much, not overly bothered by it.  Still trying to figure out what code works on my old Sony "learning" remote, RM-VL600.  Learning in quotes because the only way I find it knows a component is by the code only, as opposed to pointing remotes at each other to learn that way.Update 3/20/2013 - TV is still working just fine. As for the Sony remote mentioned above, there is a learn function I discovered and now it is a one button press to everything on and off - TV, DirecTV receiver and surround receiver. Another nice feature is connecting audio output from tv to surround receiver gets sound from whatever programming used.  In other words, if I am watching Netflix sound is routed to my surround.  Without that sound would come through tv because surround had no audio input.  I have directv audio connected to surround and tape monitor button on surround pressed to get Vizio audio.

Reviews.Title: Blank Screen
Reviews.Author: JASON
Reviews.Content: After only two (2) months my new tv screen went blank, with no sound or remote control options.  I made a report to the support centre and i am awaiting a positive response.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: J. Hentz "Judy"
Reviews.Content: We were hesitant to buy this TV because of some of the reviews, but we have 3 other Vizios which are excellent, so we took the chance and got the 70" for us and the 60" for my Mom as a delayed Christmas present.  We set hers up 3 days ago and ours the day after.  In a nutshell, I simply cannot imagine the picture or performance of this TV being better up to this point.  It's very clear, the colors pop and the contrast is excellent.  Regarding the internet apps, so far we've set up Amazon Instant Video and Netflix using the wireless capability, and those are just as eye popping as HD DirecTV.  Madmen on Netflix is almost as good as blu-ray.  Others have gone into specifics, so there's little need to duplicate, but the bottom line is:  this is a great TV regardless of price.  That it's an amazing bargain is just icing on the cake!  FYI, the picture settings are always a matter of individual taste, but we chose "golf" and then customized the sharpness to 8 and the backlight to 100.  The result is perfect for our viewing!Also, the sound of the TV is fine for TV speakers, but since we listen with other speakers that's not a main consideration for us.  We probably haven't been too critical from that standpoint.If anything changes, I'll amend this review, but at this point, I think it would be hard to find a better 60 or 70 inch TV.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Martin J. Sinclair
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV after looking for several weeks and I am writting this because of the previous reviews.  For the price we are very satisfied with picture quality, sound, internet availability, etc.  Very satisified with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love. This. TV.
Reviews.Author: AndrewN85
Reviews.Content: I was one of the lucky ones that got this baby for $688 on Black Friday Amazon Lightning sale and it has not disappointed. A 60 inch smart LED for $688, no tax, and free shipping and setup? Absolutely. The shipping carrier was great as well, came when expected, there were two guys and they took the TV out of the box and placed it where we wanted it.Setup was a breeze as well and after connecting to all of our devices this thing was up and running and amazing us in no time. We were a bit surprised by the clarity of the picture at first and unsure if we liked how realistic it looked. But after watching some shows and movies we were amazed.I cannot comment too much on the sound, it is fine for a TV but we use a Samsung Soundbar. This is my 3rd Vizio around the house and love them all. Never any problems and they just work. I don't feel the need to spend thousands more on comparable TV's. Definitely recommend not only this TV but the Vizio brand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the HD and picture!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Allen
Reviews.Content: Was not looking for an apps TV but almost all of them have it anyway.  I was most concerned with the picture quality and the design of the TV itself.  It is a very nice looking TV on or off.  Mine is wall mounted, very easily done.  Pop off the bottom stand with 4 screws on the back and attached the new wall brackets to the back in 4 spots.  EASY.Picture is super high quality.  I was used to watching 46" Samsung 1080P LCD for sports, BD movies etc.  Not sure I will turn on the Samsung anymore for this.Best buy and great quality.  Can't speak to the apps but I do not care about this as I use PS3 interface and streaming music on the new Onkyo receiver.Bought it and love it.  Read a bunch of reviews about all sorts of TV's - decided to buy it and if I didn't like it I was going to take it back.  Got it at Costco just in case.  It's a keeper so far.2 weeks in - Streaming Amazon Prime, Directv - football, basketball & tennis, BD DVD's all look fantastic.

Reviews.Title: vizio 500i
Reviews.Author: 49kazmo
Reviews.Content: The tv is great. had to wait for the back order to come in but it arrived shortly after x-mas undamaged.

Reviews.Title: FADE OUT
Reviews.Author: April J. Gifford "book lover"
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS TV ON THANKSGIVING AT WALMART WAS WATCHING TONIGHT AND IT FADED OUT AND THAT WAS IT NO MORE TV. IT STILL HAD SOUND BUT NO PICTURE THE BACK LIGHTING STILL WORKS BUT NO PICTURE. WISH I HAD READ KRIS'S REVEIW BRFORE I BOUGHT IT.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for family room
Reviews.Author: Robin Eldhardt
Reviews.Content: Nice TV used to replace a 46" TV.  It was light enough for me and husband to assemble and setup on TV stand.  The SMART TV is the way to go since it eliminated having a Blu-Ray player being tied in with another controller unit (a third controller) needed to operate the system.  The only problem is that TVs today don't come with an instruction book and having to use the internet to view the book is cumbersome.  Al in all, recommend this TV to other enthusists.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with our purchase
Reviews.Author: David M Layton
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were in the market for a new TV, and after going to the store and looking at half a hundred different models, we settled on the Vizio 60" LED Smart TV.I'm not gonna lie, it didn't have the same picture quality as a Samsung or Sony of the same size and type (LED/LCD/etc), but we wanted a larger tv as our couch is fairly far from our entertainment center, and we weren't willing to break our bank to get a better model.That said - without having the Samsung or Sony immediately next to the Vizio for comparison, I am absolutely thrilled with the picture quality.  This may be partially due to the fact that we were able to tinker with the picture settings, unlike the store display model which was on the factory default settings.We watched some South Park (not like that's a good way to judge picture quality, but whatever) and some Always Sunny in Philadelphia.  I was unsure about our purchase, however, until we turned off the lights and watched a handful of episodes of Game of Thrones with my sister.  The increased contrast you get with an LED tv was immediately apparent - the white wall shining clearly behind the men of the Night's Watch, clad in black.  The picture was absolutely stunning through the 4 episodes we watched.The SmartTV functionality works exactly as I'd expected, and it's very convenient not to have to power up the Wii every time we want to watch something on Netflix.  I read some reviews which stated that the remote and its keyboard on the back side felt cheaply made, though this was not my experience.  The remote wasn't anything special, but I don't feel like it will break if I drop it or handle it roughly.The only con to this TV is that the sound quality of the built-in speaker is pretty poor.  However, if you're spending ~$1000 on a 60" tv, you likely have already invested in an external sound solution.  If not, you'll want to spend a couple hundred bucks on a decent stereo sound system.Another thing to note is that I'm writing this review the day after we purchased it, and as this line of TVs from Vizio only came out last October, it's hard for anyone to really comment on their longevity.  For this reason, my wife and I opted for our retailer's 4-year extended warranty plan, but I will update this review in 3 months and again in 6 months or as soon as I encounter any issues with the product.In the end, I couldn't be happier with my purchase and wanted to add my voice to the others who say that this TV is the best 60" LED tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: johnny`s kindle
Reviews.Content: Picture is clear and love the price and that added plus is the smart tv.  The size is great for viewing tv.

Reviews.Title: So much better than expected
Reviews.Author: srq Ev
Reviews.Content: The delivery was right on time and the set up was very easy.  The picture quality is outstanding.  We added a sound bar and that makes it even better.  It was a great choice

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: M. Wright
Reviews.Content: We give this 5 stars for picture quality, ease of use and set up, sound quality and it's so light in weight!
